channel.title: Ethan Peterson's Site
channel.description: Recent content on Ethan Peterson's Site

item.title: Looking at the worst games in 2019 football season
item.description: I am going to be going in depth and looking at the worst games in college football from the 2019 season. First I need to load the correct library, tidyverse, and then load my data in, all of the games from the 2019 college football season. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.5 ✓ dplyr 1.

item.title: Introducing Myself
item.description: My name is Ethan Peterson. Born and raised in the small town of Stromsburg, Nebraska, approximately 15 minutes north of York on the prestigious Highway 81. I grew up in love with sports (specifically baseball) and the statistics that come with it. Die hard Yankees, Lakers, and Cornhuskers fan.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
